note: Darkbit is a group of people enthusiastic about technology and retrofuturism. We believe in a human-centered world, in which people are not treated like products — for people are people, not products. Now that we have established what people are not, here is what products are not: our family, our friends, acquaintances, lovers — though some would argue otherwise about that one — our ethics, or our ideologies. We look back to the 80s and 90s, when people sought products, not the other way around.
